strategy_summary: Seedance 2.0: The Future of AI Video Production

slides.topic: The Death of Guesswork: Seedance 2.0 is Here
slides.content: The Death of Guesswork: Seedance 2.0 is Here ByteDance just shattered the ceiling of AI Video. Meet the first Quad-Modal engine that actually listens to you.
slides.image_prompt: Anime style: A futuristic female director with glowing cyan eyes standing in a dark, high-tech studio. She is surrounded by floating holographic screens displaying vibrant anime scenes. High cinematic lighting, Makoto Shinkai aesthetic.

slides.content: Stop Prompting. Start Directing. Traditional AI is a lottery. Seedance 2.0 uses a Unified Architecture to process Text, Image, Audio, and Video all at once. It doesn't just "guess"—it executes.
slides.image_prompt: Anime style: Four pillars of concentrated elemental energy—fire, water, wind, and lightning—swirling together into a single, blinding core of light. Sharp lines, intense Ufotable-style particle effects.

slides.content: Total Control Over Every Pixel Upload up to 12 reference files per generation. Use 9 images for style, 3 videos for motion, and 3 audio tracks for rhythm. Your vision is now a locked-in reality.
slides.image_prompt: Anime style: A top-down view of a glass desk covered in glowing "memory shards" (photos) and "sound crystals" (waveforms) being dragged into a central digital vortex. Cyberpunk aesthetic, neon accents.

slides.content: No More AI Glitches Seedance 2.0 understands Gravity and Momentum. Whether it is fabric flowing in the wind or complex figure skating, the Physical Simulation is flawless. No flickering. No melting.
slides.image_prompt: Anime style: A detailed close-up of a character's clothing rippling realistically in a storm, with raindrops bouncing off the fabric. Hyper-realistic physics, focus on textures and lighting.

slides.content: Identity That Never Drifts Solve the Character Consistency problem forever. The Identity Lock algorithm ensures your protagonist looks exactly the same in every shot, from facial features to clothing details.
slides.image_prompt: Anime style: Three different camera angles of the same anime protagonist—one side profile, one extreme close-up, and one wide shot—all displayed on a film strip. Perfect consistency, clean character sheets.

slides.content: Visuals Born From Sound No more awkward lip-syncing. Seedance 2.0 features Native Audio-Visual Co-generation. The AI builds the video synchronized to the beat and the dialogue in a single pass.
slides.image_prompt: Anime style: A character singing into a microphone with visible, glowing sound waves wrapping around them and transforming into cinematic scenery. Vibrant colors, Studio MAPPA style.

slides.content: Big Screen Quality. Small Screen Speed. Export in 2K Resolution with professional aspect ratios. From 16:9 Cinematic to 9:16 Vertical, your output is ready for commercial use without watermarks.
slides.image_prompt: Anime style: A professional editing suite with multiple monitors showing a high-definition anime battle in 2K. A "Render Complete" notification glows on the screen. Tech-noir lighting.

slides.content: The @ Reference System Use the @ mention system to assign specific roles to your assets. Tell the AI: @Image1 for face, @Video1 for camera path, and @Audio1 for timing. Precision at scale.
slides.image_prompt: Anime style: A hand clicking on floating holographic tags labeled "@FACE", "@MOTION", and "@RHYTHM" in a futuristic command center. Intricate HUD overlays.

slides.content: The Era of the Solo Studio Seedance 2.0 is the New Industry Standard. Available now on Jimeng AI and CapCut. The only limit left is your imagination.
slides.image_prompt: Anime style: A solitary figure standing on a balcony overlooking a futuristic Tokyo skyline at sunset. A massive digital sun is rising. Inspiring, grand scale, high-contrast colors.
